channel.title: Time again to talk about God, dices, but now linked to the lake ness monster!
channel.description:
Continuing the discussion from [More craziness about randomness and lake ness](/talk/t/more-craziness-about-randomness-and-lake-ness/7851):
Should I include philosophical blobery in the fun category?! :)
